strings.Value: [Gently throw a little pebble at the window]
[Detect Magic] "Let's see if there's any enchantments on this gate…"
[Detect Magic] "That scarecrow looks like it might be trouble…"

{n}The pebble hits the window with a KLAK. After several moments, the door creaks open and an old woman with a tangle of grey hair and greenish skin steps out — her eyebrows and ears taper to sharp points. {/n}"Who's causing all this mischief?" {n}The woman scans the porch with a baleful eye, and her gaze locks on the pebble.{/n} "Throwing rocks now?! What, you think that bell hanging there is just for show?!"
"What in everlasting damnation…?!" {n}After a few moments, the door creaks open and an old woman with a tangle of grey hair and greenish skin steps out.{/n}
{n}No matter how loud you shout, no one answers.{/n}
{n}Your aim is true, but you've put too much strength in your throw — the window shatters! You hear shrill curses from inside the house.{/n}

{n}This house differs from the others — it's the only one that looks habitable. A low, almost-defeated fence rings it, smoke rises from the chimney, and you can smell what could be a stew — heavily spiced. Even glass windows, adorned with drapes, are intact. A small, dented brass bell hangs near the front gate, and a well-swept path leads from the gate to the door of the house. Along the side of the house lies a garden — vegetables, it seems — and in the middle of the garden, you see a scarecrow with black stones for eyes and a wicked grin stitched on its burlap face.{/n}
{n}The gate and the bell bear a simple enchantment that alerts the caster — presumably the owner of the house — about uninvited guests.{/n}
{n}The scarecrow's aura is strong, almost like a lightning flash to your senses. It is not a bundle of sticks and rags — it's a dangerous ward to protect the home from trespassers.{/n}
{n}As you snap the gate, you hear a slow creak and the snapping of tree branches — the scarecrow has stepped from its pole! Its stitched grin splits, revealing a wicked row of teeth.{/n}
"Ha ha ha! Great throw! That smashed it to pieces! Nice!"
